field_info.help: Влияние выражает степень потенциального воздействия на пользователя, услугу или конфигурационную единицу
Срочность – мера того, насколько быстро с момента своего появления ситуация приобретет существенное влияние на бизнес
Приоритет рассчитывается автоматически по матрице в зависимости от влияния и срочности

client_scripts.script:
s_form.setVisible('followers_list', !!s_form.getValue('followers_list'));
s_form.setReadOnly('followers_list', true);
s_form.hideRelatedList('Звонки Genesys');
s_form.hideRelatedList('Звонки Genesys');
s_form.setValue('related_cis', s_form.getValue('related_ke') || '');
s_form.setMandatory('assigned_user', true);

const stateModel = {
    "on_hold": [
        "on_hold",
        "working_in_the_app",
        "engineer_changing",
        "store_issued",
        "store_accept",
        "depart_agree",
        "notify_arrival",
        "write_comment"
    ],
    "engineer_changing": [
        "engineer_changing",
        "need_in",
        "need_out",
        "closed"
    ],
    "equipment_issued": [
        "equipment_issued",
        "engineer_changing",
        "closed",
        "store_issued",
        "need_in",
        "need_out",
        "equip_returned_uber",
        "write_comment"
    ],
    "closed": [
        "closed"
        //"equipment_transfer"
    ],
    "store_accept": [
        "store_accept",
        "closed",
        "need_in"
    ],
    "store_issued": [
        "store_issued",
        "equipment_issued",
        "closed",
        "need_out",
        "write_comment"
    ],
    "need_out": [
        "need_out",
        "engineer_changing",
        "store_issued",
        "closed",
        "write_comment"
    ],
    "need_in": [
        "need_in",
        "equip_returned_uber",
        "closed",
        "write_comment"
    ],
    "equip_returned_uber": [
        "equip_returned_uber",
        "store_accept",
        "closed"
    ],
    "working_in_the_app": [
        "working_in_the_app",
        "engineer_changing",
        "closed",
        "need_in",
        "need_out",
        "on_hold",
        "write_comment"
    ],
    "in_progress_sp": [
        "in_progress_sp",
        "wait_agree",
        "working_in_the_app",
        "closed"
    ],
    "wait_agree": [
        "wait_agree",
        "depart_agree"
    ],
    "depart_agree": [
        "in_progress_sp",
        "depart_agree",
        "working_in_the_app"
    ],
    "assigned": [
        "assigned",
        "in_progress_sp",
        "closed"
    ],
    "not_ready": [
        "closed",
        "not_ready"
    ],
    "equipment_transfer": [
        "equipment_transfer",
        "equipment_transferred",
        "not_ready"
    ],
    "equipment_transferred": [
        "equipment_transferred",
        "equipment_delivered",
        "equipment_not_delivered"
    ],
    "equipment_not_delivered": [
        "equipment_not_delivered",
        "return_on_warehouse"
    ],
    "equipment_delivered": [
        "equipment_delivered",
        "closed"
    ],
    "return_on_warehouse": [
        "closed",
        "return_on_warehouse"
    ],
    "notify_arrival":[
        "notify_arrival",
        "need_out",
        "need_in",
        "working_in_the_app"
    ]
};
const states = stateModel[String(s_form.getValue('multicard_state'))];
if(states){
    s_form.clearOptions('multicard_state');
    for(let state of states){
        await s_form.addOption('multicard_state', state);
    }
 }
s_form.setMandatory("additional_comments", s_form.getValue("sent_comments"))
s_form.clearValue('resubmission');
s_form.setMandatory('receipt_warehouse', s_form.getValue('zip'))

s_form.setReadOnly('issuance_zip', s_form.getValue('equipment_replacement') !== 1 && s_form.getValue('return_zip'))
s_form.setMandatory('service_facility', s_form.getValue('equipment_replacement') !== 1 && s_form.getValue('return_zip'))

s_form.setReadOnly('return_zip', s_form.getValue('equipment_replacement') !== 1 && s_form.getValue('issuance_zip'))
s_form.setMandatory('service_facility', s_form.getValue('equipment_replacement') !== 1 && s_form.getValue('issuance_zip'))
s_form.setReadOnly('new_closure_code', true)
